entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
